Hero_Lacerta.name: Lacerta
Hero_Lacerta.description: Lacerta is a former Royal Guard sniper and hunter proficient in handling firearms and gunpowder. He is accustomed to taking out enemies from long range.

constellations.name: Aimed Shot I/II/III
constellations.description: Lacerta's <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> is increased by 5/12/20%.

constellations.name: Breath of Barasas I/II/III
constellations.description: Increase the <color=yellow>Burn</color> damage over time dealt by Lacerta by 10/20/40%.

constellations.name: Sixth Sense
constellations.description: Lacerta's <color=yellow>Attack Range</color> is increased by 1.

constellations.name: Smokeless Powder
constellations.description: Increases <color=yellow>Hand Cannon</color>'s damage by 30% and slows enemies by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

constellations.name: Incendiary Rounds
constellations.description: Increases the number of shots fire by<color=yellow>Incendiary Rounds</color> by 1.

constellations.name: Hair Trigger
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Quick Draw</color> charges are restored all at once.

constellations.name: Composure and Focus
constellations.description: Increases <color=yellow>Precision Shot</color>'s charge speed by 40%.

Hero_Mist.name: Mist
Hero_Mist.description: Mist is a courageous duelist of noble birth. With agile combat techniques, she can evade dangerous attacks and swiftly dispatch enemies.

constellations.name: Astrid's Forging I/II/III
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> is increased by 3/6/12%.

constellations.name: Nimble Body I/II/III
constellations.description: Increases <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 5/7/9%.

constellations.name: Exceptional Agility
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of <color=yellow>Dodge</color> charges by 1.

constellations.name: West Wind
constellations.description: Increases <color=yellow>Lunge</color>'s maximum dash distance by 33%.

constellations.name: Lightning Breath
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Fl√®che</color> now teleports instead of dashing, and deals Light Damage.

constellations.name: Two Hearts
constellations.description: When casting <color=yellow>Unbreakable Determination</color>, recover 25% of missing health.

constellations.name: The Best Offense is Defense
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Parry</color> can now deflect attacks from all directions.

Hero_Yubar.name: Yubar
Hero_Yubar.description: Yubar is a fairy tale being from dreams, a god who governs the creation and destruction of stars. He can deal high damage from long range using magic.
Hero_Yubar.unlockBy: Acquire a total of 300 Dream Dust.

constellations.name: Night Sky Silk I/II/III
constellations.description: Increases <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by 5/10/15%.

constellations.name: Stellar Flow I/II/III
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> is increased by 3/7/12 reducing the cooldown of all my memories by 3/7/11%.

constellations.name: Now You See Me
constellations.description: Increases the maximum travel distance of <color=yellow>Flicker</color> by 35%.

constellations.name: Neutron Star
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Ethereal Influence</color>'s cooldown is reduced by 5% for each enemy hit by the explosion.

constellations.name: Young Stars's Power
constellations.description: Increase <color=yellow>Supernova</color>'s size by 20% and stuns enemies for 1 second.

constellations.name: Blazing Meteor
constellations.description: <color=yellow>Cataclysm</color>'s meteors scorch the ground, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>175%</color> Light Damage over 2 seconds.

constellations.name: Light Heart
constellations.description: When channeling <color=yellow>Tranquility</color>, deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>165%</color> damage to all colliding enemies and briefly stun them.

Hero_Vesper.name: Vesper
Hero_Vesper.description: Vesper is the leader and cruel inquisitor of the Order of the Sacred Flame. He can block enemies in melee range while dealing high damage.
Hero_Vesper.unlockBy: Reach the Dream of the Night Sky.

Hero_Aurena.name: Aurena
Hero_Aurena.description: Aurena is a sage from the Lunar Conclave of Arcanum who was expelled for researching forbidden knowledge. She is a battle healer who utilizes her own life force.
Hero_Aurena.unlockBy: Heal yourself or allies for a total of 25,000 health.
